Word.Root: To grieve, afflict, overburden, distress, twist a rope, tighten.

Meaning.Definition: كَرَبَ aor. يَكْرُبُ inf. noun كَرْبًا . كَرَبَ الْحَبْلَ : He twisted the rope. كَرَبَ الْقَيْدَ عَلَى الْمُقَيَّدِ : He straitened the shackles upon the shackled. كَرَبَهُ الْغَمُّ : The grief afflicted, distressed or oppressed him. كَرْبٌ : Grief or distress that affects the breath; anxiety or disquietude of the mind.
